name: Connection Madness
description:
Connection Madness

There's a strange malfunction at the power station you work at. You and your friends (or just you) are tasked with keeping the power station from going kaboom by keeping all the power relays intact! Because of budget cuts, the fuses aren't the best! They will explode, hurry, if you don't replace them quickly the power relay will be destroyed!

"Fun in 3 Steps"
- Push the switch to get a fuse from storage.
- Pick up the fuse
- Carry the fuse to the power relay!

Keyboard:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move character
Space to interact, pick & drop fuses
Left-Shift to Dash!

Controller:

Left Stick to move the player.
A to interact, pick & drop fuses
B to Dash!

Drink enough water while playing ;-)
